notes:
[Hangarback Walker] is the obvious first pick. I've already gone on at length about how it's great when ever you play, it sinks mana, and is resilient to removal.

The runner up is one of the removal spells: [Ravaging Blaze] edges out both [Claustrophobia] and [Unholy Hunger] because not only is [Ravaging Blaze] a removal spell, but it can just burn your opponent out.
